name: Bett

projects.title: Project One
projects.description: Attempt at creating an motor thrust measuring system

services.title: Software design
services.description: I provide comprehensive software design services, crafting solutions that seamlessly integrate functionality and user experience. My expertise lies in conceptualizing system architectures, defining data flow, and creating intuitive user interfaces. Through thoughtful design, I ensure the development of efficient, scalable, and user-friendly software solutions.

services.title: Drawing
services.description: I offer professional drawing services in Fusion 360, utilizing the software's robust capabilities to create precise 2D sketches and transform them into intricate 3D models. My expertise includes leveraging various tools and constraints, ensuring accurate and customizable designs.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: My services encompass layout, navigation, and graphic elements, ensuring seamless functionality and an engaging interface. I focus on responsive design, optimizing websites for various devices to enhance accessibility and user satisfaction.

services.title: IOT development
services.description: I specialize in IoT (Internet of Things) development services, creating innovative solutions that seamlessly connect devices and enable data-driven decision-making. My expertise spans sensor integration, communication protocols, cloud connectivity, and application development. I design and implement IoT systems that enhance efficiency, monitor assets, and provide actionable insights, tailored to meet specific industry requirements.

aboutpara:
I am a JKUAT student studying Mechatronics with a passion for IoT, software development, chess, and bike riding. Proficient in Python, Rust, C, C++, Lua, and Bash, I apply my diverse programming skills to various projects. Currently pursuing my academic journey, I integrate theoretical knowledge with practical applications. My fascination with IoT fuels my exploration of innovative solutions connecting the physical and digital realms. Beyond technology, I am an avid chess player, fostering analytical and strategic thinking. Exploring the world on a bike provides a refreshing balance to my academic and technological pursuits.

In the realm of Cybersecurity, I contribute to securing systems and data, recognizing its critical importance in our interconnected world. This concise portfolio encapsulates my academic dedication, technical expertise, and personal interests. Excited about the intersection of creativity and technology, I am eager to apply my skills to future projects and contribute meaningfully to the dynamic field of IT.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹  I'm a software engineer, Student Engineer
resume.description: I have participated in projects that improved my skills in IOT, Pentesting and Software development.

experiences.bullets: Collaborated with a team to create a remote test stand for measuring rocket thrust - Utilized Esp-idf, nRF24 modules, and load cells for accurate data collection - Contributed to the design and implementation of the testing system - Demonstrated problem-solving skills in overcoming technical challenges

Collaborated with a team to create a pick and assemble line follower robot.  Utilised Arduino, motors, a Raspberry Pi, and a camera to locate objects to be picked, move the line follower to them, and transport it to a specified location for assembly.

education.universityName: Jomo Kenyatta University of Agriculture and Technology
